comment: You will not meet a professor more lovely than this man. He has the kindest nature I've ever come across in an educator, and despite his demeanor, he is so very social and has an endless wealth of knowledge on animation and networking. If you simply do your best to animate what he asks of you, you're golden. It's hard to wanted to disrespect him.

I had Schwartz for Foundation Animation and he was absolutely wonderful. He did keep critique a little too nice for me at the beginning but if you need help understanding motion concepts, he is very eager to help. He has a nice balance of guiding students while also giving them independence. He was one of the best professors I've had in a while.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
